entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who wrote the biography 'The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore'. She is described as revealing the disturbed childhood, lawless youth, and guilty secrets of Dumbledore. (Excerpt: 'Stripping away the popular image of serene, silver-bearded wisdom, Rita Skeeter reveals...')

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is a wizard who was tipped to be Minister of Magic. He had a disturbed childhood and carried guilty secrets to his grave. (Excerpt: 'The answers to these and many more questions are explored in the explosive new biography, The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore...')

entities.name: betty braithwaite
entities.description: Betty Braithwaite is a person who exclusively interviewed Rita Skeeter for her biography. (Excerpt: 'exclusively interviewed by Betty Braithwaite, page 13, inside')

entities.name: the order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is a secret organization whose real purpose is unknown. (Excerpt: 'WHAT was the real purpose of the secret organization known as the Order of the Phoenix?')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who ripped open the paper to find an article about Rita Skeeter. (Excerpt: 'Harry ripped open the paper and found page thirteen.')

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter wrote a biography about Albus Dumbledore. (Excerpt: 'The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore, by Rita Skeeter...')
Rita Skeeter was exclusively interviewed by Betty Braithwaite. (Excerpt: 'exclusively interviewed by Betty Braithwaite, page 13, inside')
Albus Dumbledore was involved with the Order of the Phoenix. (Excerpt: 'WHAT was the real purpose of the secret organization known as the Order of the Phoenix?')
Harry read an article about Rita Skeeter. (Excerpt: 'Harry ripped open the paper and found page thirteen.')
